Activity periods to be published by NOTAM
Information on activation including upper and lower limits and contact authority provided by NOTAM. Dates and times promulgated by NOTAM ten days in advance.
SAR exercise/operations in VMC only.
Non-exercise aircraft (ACFT) should avoid areas. If area cannot be avoided, detailed INFO on actual activities can be obtained from Amswell ACC or Denham FIC.
In Amswell FIR and Denham FIR in the Caybis Sea north of 56N and up to 60N
